alert.note: Alert for Dewey; Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 11 at 1:58PM MDT until April 14 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Walworth and Dewey Counties. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
